description: Join us for an elegant fashion show by OpéraSport at the iconic Copenhagen City Hall. This event showcases their latest collection, blending modern aesthetics with sustainable practices, set against the grandeur of this historic venue.

A unique presentation by Sól Hansdóttir at the Copenhagen Design Museum, celebrated as a rising star and 'One to Watch' in fashion. Explore her visionary designs in a setting that honors art and design innovation.

Forza Collective presents a fashion show displaying a dynamic collection at Refshaleøen, an industrial area known for creative spaces. The show will blend youthful energy and modern sophistication in this unique urban setting.

Witness the cutting-edge fashion show by A. Roege Hove at Ny Carlsberg Glyptotek, a museum known for its beautiful architecture and art collections. This event showcases bold knitwear and innovative silhouettes.

Don't miss Stem's 'One to Watch' presentation at Charlottenborg Palace. Known for its historical significance and art exhibitions, the venue provides a fitting backdrop for Stem's experimental and distinct designs.

placename: Royal Danish Library - The Black Diamond
description: Join the fashion show by Rolf Ekroth at Copenhagen Contemporary, a space dedicated to contemporary art. His collection, part of CPHFW NewTalent, blends streetwear and storytelling, creating an urban and artistic showcase.

A fashion show by Alectra Rothschild/Masculina at the historic Round Tower, part of CPHFW NewTalent, showcasing bold, gender-fluid designs in a venue that has witnessed centuries of culture and innovation.

La Bagatelle invites you to an exclusive presentation at the Amalienborg Palace Square. Discover luxurious yet minimalist designs in this iconic location, set against the backdrop of Danish royal history.
Discover Joao Maraschin's fashion show at Copenhagen City Hall, showcasing a blend of sustainability and craftsmanship in a venue rich with history and elegance.
Attend the fashion show by Berner Kühl, part of CPHFW NewTalent, at the serene Copenhagen Botanical Garden. His sleek, timeless designs resonate with the peaceful natural environment.

placename: Royal Danish Library - The Black Diamond
description: Caro Editions presents a captivating fashion experience in the architectural marvel of The Black Diamond. Discover pieces crafted with sustainability in mind, blending art and environmental consciousness.

placename: Royal Danish Academy of Fine Arts
description: Experience The Royal Danish Academy's student showcase at their prestigious campus, featuring forward-thinking designs that explore new dimensions of fashion and creativity.

Ukrainian Fashion Week presents an inspiring fashion presentation at Amalienborg Palace Square. This event brings together designers from Ukraine, showcasing unique styles in an iconic Danish location.
Join Lovechild 1979's fashion show at Ny Carlsberg Glyptotek. This event highlights a feminine, modern collection against the stunning backdrop of a historic museum, blending art and fashion.

Explore the avant-garde fashion of Nicklas Skovgaard in a presentation at Charlottenborg Palace, a venue synonymous with Danish art and culture. This event offers a unique perspective on modern fashion design.

Join the innovative fashion show by Stamm at the Royal Danish Theatre, where traditional craftsmanship meets avant-garde design. Known for blending sustainable practices with forward-thinking styles, Stamm creates pieces that challenge conventional fashion norms.

Explore a unique presentation by Another Aspect, held in the stunning architecture of the National Gallery of Denmark. Known for its approach to slow fashion, Another Aspect focuses on timeless designs that emphasize quality over trend.

(di)vision presents a thought-provoking fashion show at the Copenhagen City Hall, pushing the boundaries of conventional fashion with a unique approach to upcycling and reimagined streetwear. Known for transforming discarded materials into wearable art, (di)vision combines deconstructed silhouettes with bold patterns.

Welcome to the Father Earth Fashion Event—a transcendent experience where fashion and nature unite in a breathtaking homage to our planet. Tonight, the wilderness is our runway, and Earth itself is our muse. Beneath a starlit canopy, amidst ancient trees and whispering leaves, you are invited to journey into a world where art, sustainability, and raw elegance collide.

placename: Royal Danish Library - The Black Diamond
description: Experience the avant-garde artistry of YOUNG LATEX, a boundary-pushing show exploring the intersections of fashion, modernism, and raw expression. Hosted in Copenhagen’s architectural masterpiece, The Black Diamond.

West is Best offers an immersive fashion experience, spotlighting the latest Western-inspired trends and aesthetics. Blending rugged charm with contemporary style, this event brings together designs that evoke freedom, strength, and individuality.

The Transgender Pride Parade is a celebration of resilience, diversity, and unity, bringing together people from all walks of life to honor the beauty and strength of the transgender community. This event is a reminder that every individual deserves respect, love, and a voice.
Join us for the exclusive opening reception to kick off the festivities with a night of fashion and networking.

placename: Royal Danish Library - The Black Diamond
description: Explore the latest designs from emerging fashion talent in this unique showroom showcasing creativity and innovation.
A late-night event for creators to mingle, collaborate, and celebrate artistic expression in the world of fashion.
An exclusive dinner event gathering industry leaders, designers, and influencers to celebrate the culmination of fashion week.
